name: DuckDB Writer
description: Write DataFrames to DuckDB tables with create, append, or replace modes

inputs.description: Connect a DataFrame-producing asset to write to DuckDB

outputs.description: Writes DataFrame to DuckDB table (no output)

asset_name.label: Asset Name
asset_name.description: Name of the asset to create

database_path.label: Database Path
database_path.description: Path to the DuckDB database file (will be created if doesn't exist)

table_name.label: Table Name
table_name.description: Name of the table to write data to

write_mode.label: Write Mode
write_mode.description: Write mode: 'create' (fail if exists), 'replace' (drop and recreate), 'append' (add rows)

upstream_asset_keys.label: Upstream Asset Keys
upstream_asset_keys.description: Comma-separated list of upstream asset keys to load DataFrames from (automatically set by custom lineage)
